name: Mexican Chocolate Pudding
description: A Mexican twist on a comfort food classic – chocolate pudding!
preparation: In a mixing bowl, combine Chocolate Instant Pudding Mix with milk, Cinnamon, chipotle chili and vanilla.
Mix with Piano Wire Whisk, or beat with an electric mixer on low setting for 2 minutes.
Pour into serving dishes. Cover and refrigerate at least 10 minutes before serving.

products.name: Chocolate Instant Pudding Mix (Pack of 2)
summary: Spoon after delicious spoon, satisfy your sweet tooth with a low-calorie chocolate pudding that’s decadent and oh-so-good.
